name: OIA_RFs_ACS_ICD10
title: OIA_RFs_ACS_ICD10
purpose: (Clinical Focus: ICD10CM codes indicating acute coronary syndrome (ACS)),(Data Element Scope: Codes used as risk factors for the solution contained in patients problem list and/or claims data),(Inclusion Criteria: Codes for  STEMI, NSTEMI, and unstable angina, including codes indicating a history of myocardial infarction.),(Exclusion Criteria: Non-billable codes)
